description:
Pair this lightweight cable lock with your trusty U-lock to increase the chances of your bike, staying your bike. This cable is a good way to add an extra layer of security when locking wheels and other accessories.

  • Theft deterring 8mm braided steel cables
  • Reversible keys make locking and unlocking easy
  • Sliding weather guards protect lock mechanism
  • Includes easy to mount bracket
  • Covered by Kryptonite’s optional Key Safe Program for stress-free key replacements if you lose them in your next move
  • We recommend a strong U-lock or U-lock and cable lock combo to secure bikes in public
name: Kryptonite Kryptoflex 815 Key Cable Lock
